page.title: 10INDUSTRY
page.content: {INDUSTRY}has changed from heavy steel and engineering work to lighter industry.A new Industrial Estate is on the Site,of Colville's steel work. Repose Bedding ,Norson Power,Apple Van Hire,Countryside Foods,Johnston Commercial Vehicles,J&A Ferguson ,Ring Lamp Comp,Cambuslang Exhaust Centre, Clyde Microfilm,Curry'S Bakehouse, Mackintosh Bros,Scottish Billiards, Pyeroy Ltd.,Cultrab,Richken,Hydrasun, Chemar Valves,S.L.D.Oldings Ltd.Norit U.K. {LONDON RD.}has Pickfords,Roche and Lind,Wellpark Trucks,Hireplant, Whatlings,Wysehire,Tripower,S.G.D. Young,Greenham Tools,R.J.McLeod,R.T.Z. Metals,General George Carpets,J.G.T. Thomson,Johnston and Paton Ltd. {CARMYLE AVE}has Paxton,Strathclyde Coachworks,Focus,Le Marquand,Taymech. Taylor Woodrow,Whitevale Motors.
